Name: Creating Accessible Content for a Diverse Audience
SEO - Meta Title: Creating Accessible Content for a Diverse Audience | Case Study
SEO - Meta Description: Discover how we empowered Aktarr to streamline their operations and enhance productivity through automation.
Hero - Introduction: Discover how our innovative no-code solutions have empowered Aktarr to streamline their operations and enhance productivity. This case study highlights the remarkable journey and outcomes achieved through our tailored automation strategies.
Card - Title: Creating Accessible Content for a Diverse Audience
Card - Description: Discover how we helped Aktarr reach their target audience with swift and accurate translations.
Tech Stack - Description: We combined Notion, n8n and Apify to curate and create high-quality content.
Tech Stack Item 1 - Description: The client can now easily manage their flow from their mobile phone on notion
Tech Stack Item 2 - Description: We built the flow with n8n, split into the article finder and article writer
Tech Stack Item 3 - Description: We created an efficient setup to trigger an Apify scraper using custom HTTP requests
Tech Stack Item 4 - Description: We configured an Apify scraper that can login and auto-refresh the cookies
Results - Description: This project achieved remarkable results through streamlined processes. Our automation solutions significantly reduced operational time and costs.
Result 1 - Description: We were able to generate 40 high quality articles per hour in Arabic.
Result 2 - Description: The client has gone form spending whole days writing articles to 1h per day for 20.
Result 3 - Description: It only requires a few mins of proof reading to publish each article.
